permission.Name: ACCESS_CHECKIN_PROPERTIES
permission.Description: Allows read/write access to the "properties" table in the checkin database, to change values that get uploaded.

permission.Name: ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
permission.Description: Allows an app to access approximate location.

permission.Name: ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
permission.Description: Allows an app to access precise location.

permission.Name: ACCESS_LOCATION_EXTRA_COMMANDS
permission.Description: Allows an application to access extra location provider commands.

permission.Name: ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE
permission.Description: Allows applications to access information about networks.

permission.Name: ACCESS_NOTIFICATION_POLICY
permission.Description: Marker permission for applications that wish to access notification policy.

permission.Name: ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
permission.Description: Allows applications to access information about Wi-Fi networks.

permission.Name: ACCOUNT_MANAGER
permission.Description: Allows applications to call into AccountAuthenticators.

permission.Name: ADD_VOICEMAIL
permission.Description: Allows an application to add voicemails into the system.

permission.Name: BATTERY_STATS
permission.Description: Allows an application to collect battery statistics

permission.Name: BIND_ACCESSIBILITY_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by an AccessibilityService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_APPWIDGET
permission.Description: Allows an application to tell the AppWidget service which application can access AppWidget's data.

permission.Name: BIND_CARRIER_MESSAGING_SERVICE
permission.Description: This constant was deprecated in API level 23. Use BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES instead

permission.Name: BIND_CARRIER_SERVICES
permission.Description: The system process that is allowed to bind to services in carrier apps will have this permission.

permission.Name: BIND_CHOOSER_TARGET_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by a ChooserTargetService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN
permission.Description: Must be required by device administration receiver, to ensure that only the system can interact with it.

permission.Name: BIND_DREAM_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by an DreamService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_INCALL_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by a InCallService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_INPUT_METHOD
permission.Description: Must be required by an InputMethodService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_MIDI_DEVICE_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by an MidiDeviceService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_NFC_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by a HostApduService or OffHostApduService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_NOTIFICATION_LISTENER_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by an NotificationListenerService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_PRINT_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by a PrintService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_REMOTEVIEWS
permission.Description: Must be required by a RemoteViewsService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_TELECOM_CONNECTION_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by a ConnectionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_TEXT_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by a TextService (eg SpellCheckerService) to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_TV_INPUT
permission.Description: Must be required by a TvInputService to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_VOICE_INTERACTION
permission.Description: Must be required by a VoiceInteractionService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_VPN_SERVICE
permission.Description: Must be required by a VpnService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BIND_WALLPAPER
permission.Description: Must be required by a WallpaperService, to ensure that only the system can bind to it.

permission.Name: BLUETOOTH
permission.Description: Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices.

permission.Name: BLUETOOTH_ADMIN
permission.Description: Allows applications to discover and pair bluetooth devices.

permission.Name: BLUETOOTH_PRIVILEGED
permission.Description: Allows applications to pair bluetooth devices without user interaction, and to allow or disallow phonebook access or message access.

permission.Name: BODY_SENSORS
permission.Description: Allows an application to access data from sensors that the user uses to measure what is happening inside his/her body, such as heart rate.

permission.Name: BROADCAST_PACKAGE_REMOVED
permission.Description: Allows an application to broadcast a notification that an application package has been removed.

permission.Name: BROADCAST_SMS
permission.Description: Allows an application to broadcast an SMS receipt notification.

permission.Name: BROADCAST_STICKY
permission.Description: Allows an application to broadcast sticky intents.

permission.Name: BROADCAST_WAP_PUSH
permission.Description: Allows an application to broadcast a WAP PUSH receipt notification.

permission.Name: CALL_PHONE
permission.Description: Allows an application to initiate a phone call without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call.

permission.Name: CALL_PRIVILEGED
permission.Description: Allows an application to call any phone number, including emergency numbers, without going through the Dialer user interface for the user to confirm the call being placed.

permission.Name: CAMERA
permission.Description: Required to be able to access the camera device.

permission.Name: CAPTURE_AUDIO_OUTPUT
permission.Description: Allows an application to capture audio output.

permission.Name: CAPTURE_SECURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT
permission.Description: Allows an application to capture secure video output.

permission.Name: CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT
permission.Description: Allows an application to capture video output.

permission.Name: CHANGE_COMPONENT_ENABLED_STATE
permission.Description: Allows an application to change whether an application component (other than its own) is enabled or not.

permission.Name: CHANGE_CONFIGURATION
permission.Description: Allows an application to modify the current configuration, such as locale.

permission.Name: CHANGE_NETWORK_STATE
permission.Description: Allows applications to change network connectivity state.

permission.Name: CHANGE_WIFI_MULTICAST_STATE
permission.Description: Allows applications to enter Wi-Fi Multicast mode.

permission.Name: CHANGE_WIFI_STATE
permission.Description: Allows applications to change Wi-Fi connectivity state.

permission.Name: CLEAR_APP_CACHE
permission.Description: Allows an application to clear the caches of all installed applications on the device.

permission.Name: CONTROL_LOCATION_UPDATES
permission.Description: Allows enabling/disabling location update notifications from the radio.

permission.Name: DELETE_CACHE_FILES
permission.Description: Allows an application to delete cache files.

permission.Name: DELETE_PACKAGES
permission.Description: Allows an application to delete packages.

permission.Name: DIAGNOSTIC
permission.Description: Allows applications to RW to diagnostic resources.

permission.Name: DISABLE_KEYGUARD
permission.Description: Allows applications to disable the keyguard if it is not secure.

permission.Name: DUMP
permission.Description: Allows an application to retrieve state dump information from system services.

permission.Name: EXPAND_STATUS_BAR
permission.Description: Allows an application to expand or collapse the status bar.

permission.Name: FACTORY_TEST
permission.Description: Run as a manufacturer test application, running as the root user.

permission.Name: FLASHLIGHT
permission.Description: Allows access to the flashlight.

permission.Name: GET_ACCOUNTS
permission.Description: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.

permission.Name: GET_ACCOUNTS_PRIVILEGED
permission.Description: Allows access to the list of accounts in the Accounts Service.

permission.Name: GET_PACKAGE_SIZE
permission.Description: Allows an application to find out the space used by any package.

permission.Name: GET_TASKS
permission.Description: This constant was deprecated in API level 21. No longer enforced.

permission.Name: GLOBAL_SEARCH
permission.Description: This permission can be used on content providers to allow the global search system to access their data.

permission.Name: INSTALL_LOCATION_PROVIDER
permission.Description: Allows an application to install a location provider into the Location Manager.

permission.Name: INSTALL_PACKAGES
permission.Description: Allows an application to install packages.

permission.Name: INSTALL_SHORTCUT
permission.Description: Allows an application to install a shortcut in Launcher.

permission.Name: INTERNET
permission.Description: Allows applications to open network sockets.

permission.Name: KILL_BACKGROUND_PROCESSES
permission.Description: Allows an application to call killBackgroundProcesses(String).

permission.Name: LOCATION_HARDWARE
permission.Description: Allows an application to use location features in hardware, such as the geofencing api.

permission.Name: MANAGE_DOCUMENTS
permission.Description: Allows an application to manage access to documents, usually as part of a document picker.

permission.Name: MASTER_CLEAR
permission.Description: Not for use by third-party applications.

permission.Name: MEDIA_CONTENT_CONTROL
permission.Description: Allows an application to know what content is playing and control its playback.

permission.Name: MODIFY_AUDIO_SETTINGS
permission.Description: Allows an application to modify global audio settings.

permission.Name: MODIFY_PHONE_STATE
permission.Description: Allows modification of the telephony state - power on, mmi, etc.

permission.Name: MOUNT_FORMAT_FILESYSTEMS
permission.Description: Allows formatting file systems for removable storage.

permission.Name: MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYSTEMS
permission.Description: Allows mounting and unmounting file systems for removable storage.

permission.Name: NFC
permission.Description: Allows applications to perform I/O operations over NFC.

permission.Name: PACKAGE_USAGE_STATS
permission.Description: Allows an application to collect component usage statistics

permission.Name: Declaring
permission.Description: the permission implies intention to use the API and the user of the device can grant permission through the Settings application.

permission.Name: PERSISTENT_ACTIVITY
permission.Description: This constant was deprecated in API level 9. This functionality will be removed in the future; please do not use. Allow an application to make its activities persistent.

permission.Name: PROCESS_OUTGOING_CALLS
permission.Description: Allows an application to see the number being dialed during an outgoing call with the option to redirect the call to a different number or abort the call altogether.

permission.Name: READ_CALENDAR
permission.Description: Allows an application to read the user's calendar data.

permission.Name: READ_CALL_LOG
permission.Description: Allows an application to read the user's call log.

permission.Name: READ_CONTACTS
permission.Description: Allows an application to read the user's contacts data.

permission.Name: READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
permission.Description: Allows an application to read from external storage.

permission.Name: READ_FRAME_BUFFER
permission.Description: Allows an application to take screen shots and more generally get access to the frame buffer data.

permission.Name: READ_INPUT_STATE
permission.Description: This constant was deprecated in API level 16. The API that used this permission has been removed.

permission.Name: READ_LOGS
permission.Description: Allows an application to read the low-level system log files.

permission.Name: READ_PHONE_STATE
permission.Description: Allows read only access to phone state.

permission.Name: READ_SMS
permission.Description: Allows an application to read SMS messages.

permission.Name: READ_SYNC_SETTINGS
permission.Description: Allows applications to read the sync settings.

permission.Name: READ_SYNC_STATS
permission.Description: Allows applications to read the sync stats.

permission.Name: READ_VOICEMAIL
permission.Description: Allows an application to read voicemails in the system.

permission.Name: REBOOT
permission.Description: Required to be able to reboot the device.

permission.Name: RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED
permission.Description: Allows an application to receive the ACTION_BOOT_COMPLETED that is broadcast after the system finishes booting.

permission.Name: RECEIVE_MMS
permission.Description: Allows an application to monitor incoming MMS messages.

permission.Name: RECEIVE_SMS
permission.Description: Allows an application to receive SMS messages.

permission.Name: RECEIVE_WAP_PUSH
permission.Description: Allows an application to receive WAP push messages.

permission.Name: RECORD_AUDIO
permission.Description: Allows an application to record audio.

permission.Name: REORDER_TASKS
permission.Description: Allows an application to change the Z-order of tasks.

permission.Name: REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS
permission.Description: Permission an application must hold in order to use ACTION_REQUEST_IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS.

permission.Name: REQUEST_INSTALL_PACKAGES
permission.Description: Allows an application to request installing packages.

permission.Name: RESTART_PACKAGES
permission.Description: This constant was deprecated in API level 8. The restartPackage(String) API is no longer supported.

permission.Name: SEND_RESPOND_VIA_MESSAGE
permission.Description: Allows an application (Phone) to send a request to other applications to handle the respond-via-message action during incoming calls.

permission.Name: SEND_SMS
permission.Description: Allows an application to send SMS messages.

permission.Name: SET_ALARM
permission.Description: Allows an application to broadcast an Intent to set an alarm for the user.

permission.Name: SET_ALWAYS_FINISH
permission.Description: Allows an application to control whether activities are immediately finished when put in the background.

permission.Name: SET_ANIMATION_SCALE
permission.Description: Modify the global animation scaling factor.

permission.Name: SET_DEBUG_APP
permission.Description: Configure an application for debugging.

permission.Name: SET_PREFERRED_APPLICATIONS
permission.Description: This constant was deprecated in API level 7. No longer useful, see addPackageToPreferred(String) for details.

permission.Name: SET_PROCESS_LIMIT
permission.Description: Allows an application to set the maximum number of (not needed) application processes that can be running.

permission.Name: SET_TIME
permission.Description: Allows applications to set the system time.

permission.Name: SET_TIME_ZONE
permission.Description: Allows applications to set the system time zone.

permission.Name: SET_WALLPAPER
permission.Description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper.

permission.Name: SET_WALLPAPER_HINTS
permission.Description: Allows applications to set the wallpaper hints.

permission.Name: SIGNAL_PERSISTENT_PROCESSES
permission.Description: Allow an application to request that a signal be sent to all persistent processes.

permission.Name: STATUS_BAR
permission.Description: Allows an application to open, close, or disable the status bar and its icons.

permission.Name: SYSTEM_ALERT_WINDOW
permission.Description: Allows an app to create windows using the type TYPE_SYSTEM_ALERT, shown on top of all other apps.

permission.Name: TRANSMIT_IR
permission.Description: Allows using the device's IR transmitter, if available.

permission.Name: UNINSTALL_SHORTCUT
permission.Description: Allows an application to uninstall a shortcut in Launcher.

permission.Name: UPDATE_DEVICE_STATS
permission.Description: Allows an application to update device statistics.

permission.Name: USE_FINGERPRINT
permission.Description: Allows an app to use fingerprint hardware.

permission.Name: USE_SIP
permission.Description: Allows an application to use SIP service.

permission.Name: VIBRATE
permission.Description: Allows access to the vibrator.

permission.Name: WAKE_LOCK
permission.Description: Allows using PowerManager WakeLocks to keep processor from sleeping or screen from dimming.

permission.Name: WRITE_APN_SETTINGS
permission.Description: Allows applications to write the apn settings.

permission.Name: WRITE_CALENDAR
permission.Description: Allows an application to write the user's calendar data.

permission.Name: WRITE_CALL_LOG
permission.Description: Allows an application to write (but not read) the user's contacts data.

permission.Name: WRITE_CONTACTS
permission.Description: Allows an application to write the user's contacts data.

permission.Name: WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
permission.Description: Allows an application to write to external storage.

permission.Name: WRITE_GSERVICES
permission.Description: Allows an application to modify the Google service map.

permission.Name: WRITE_SECURE_SETTINGS
permission.Description: Allows an application to read or write the secure system settings.

permission.Name: WRITE_SETTINGS
permission.Description: Allows an application to read or write the system settings.

permission.Name: WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS
permission.Description: Allows applications to write the sync settings.

permission.Name: WRITE_VOICEMAIL
permission.Description: Allows an application to modify and remove existing voicemails in the system.
